titles.title: A resolution providing recess authority during the legislative days of September 30, 1988 and October 1, 1988.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1022.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/30/1988--Introduced. Grants recess authority to the Speaker of the House during the legislative days of September 30 and October 1, 1988.
